title: Catalyst-free regioselective sulfonylation of phenoxazine with sulfonyl hydrazides in H2O/HFIP
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31429-31432
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06625A, Paper

Yanan Li, Lin Li, Jing Tan, Chenpei Yang, Yifei Wang, Feiyang Li, Chenyu Liu, Xiaohui Wu, Jianan Sun
A facile catalyst-free sulfonylation of phenoxazine with sulfonyl hydrazides was efficiently developed in H2O/HFIP without any catalyst.
